DataElement.preferredName: Dexamethasone Symptom Questionnaire During Week Post Chemotherapy Have Hiccups Score 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of the incidence and severity of hiccups during the week following dexamethasone treatment, using a four point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Dexamethasone Symptom Questionnaire During Week Post Chemotherapy Have Hiccups Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to determine the incidence, severity, and change of side effects between cycles of chemotherapy_At some point in a given period of time._Any period of seven consecutive days._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._The use of synthetic or naturally-occurring chemicals for the treatment of diseases.  Although this term is used to describe any therapy involving the use of chemical-based agents, it is particularly used to refer to the use of chemical-based agents to treat cancer. Antineoplastic chemotherapy works by arresting or killing the growth and spread of cancer cells. Chemotherapy may also include agents that enhance immune function or alter hormonal activity._A question about whether an individual has or had hiccups._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to determine the incidence, severity, and change of side effects between cycles of chemotherapy

Concepts.definition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to determine the incidence, severity, and change of side effects between cycles of chemotherapy.

Concepts.definition: A psychometric scale commonly used in questionnaires where a respondent is asked to evaluate an opinion according to subjective or objective criteria, by rating their level of agreement or disagreement with a statement.
How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.
An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
